item.title: Strangler Fig
item.description: In the autumn of 2018 we started an epic project of a next generation SSP system, to turn our hardcoded fixed-order ad request model to a fully configurable one. This pretty much guaranteed a large boost of revenue and a total revision of our code base. Background We were in a heavily solution-oriented business. In this project, a nearly zero downtime was mandatory. We had a small dev team, consisting of 2 senior devs and 1 junior, maintaining several other system components at the same time.
